# Logical

This folder contains extensions that help with logical functions, conversions, comparisons, etc.

## Compare

Compare two values and return the result.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Compare&org=true&" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Compare&org=true&" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>

## Convert date

Convert date from one format to dd-mm-yyyy.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=ConvertDate&org=true&%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=ConvertDate&org=true&%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>

## Today's UK date

Generate today's date in dd-mm-yyyy format.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUK&org=true&" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUK&org=true&" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>

## Future UK date

Generate a future date with a given number of days in UK format.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUK&org=true&%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUK&org=true&%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>

## Today's US date

Generate today's date in mm-dd-yyyy format.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUS&org=true&" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUS&org=true&" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>

## Future US date

Generate a future date with a given number of days in US format.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUS&org=true&%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUS&org=true&%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>

## Lowercase

Convert a string to lowercase.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Lowercase&org=true&%%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Lowercase&org=true&%%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>

## Join

Join multiple inputs to create a single string.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Join&org=true&" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Join&org=true&" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>

## Replace

Join multiple inputs to create a single string.

- <a href="https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Replace&org=true&%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app2 (Free trial) env</a>
- <a href="https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Replace&org=true&%3D%3D" class="button big">Add to app (Production) env</a>
